channel.title: Mastodon on Boffin The Tinkerer
channel.description: Recent content in Mastodon on Boffin The Tinkerer

item.title: Fuck Techbros
item.description: Redirect their web scraping, either to a friendly URL or a not-so-friendly one. Now with a how-to on null bombs and tarpits.

item.title: RSS to Toot
item.description: Turn an RSS feed in to a Mastodon toot. Send either the latest RSS entry or a stream of Mastodon posts.

item.title: Mastodon / IFTTT Bot
item.description: Twitter bots were fun while they lasted but Mastodon bots can be informative and fun too.

item.title: Delete Your Mastodon Favourites
item.description: Removing old posts is a trivial matter now that Mastodon allows for automated post deletions, removing old favourites is not so straighforward.
